statements: SELECT * FROM customer_engagement_metrics;
SELECT customer_id, impressions, conversions FROM customer_engagement_metrics WHERE clicks > 10;
SELECT campaign_id, clicks, impressions FROM customer_engagement_metrics ORDER BY clicks DESC;
SELECT customer_id, campaign_id, conversions FROM customer_engagement_metrics WHERE time >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT AVG(clicks) AS avg_clicks, MIN(impressions) AS min_impressions, MAX(conversions) AS max_conversions FROM customer_engagement_metrics;
SELECT * FROM customer_engagement_metrics WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
SELECT customer_id, clicks, impressions FROM customer_engagement_metrics WHERE clicks > 100 AND impressions < 500 ORDER BY time DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, SUM(conversions) AS total_conversions FROM customer_engagement_metrics GROUP BY campaign_id HAVING total_conversions > 10 ORDER BY total_conversions DESC;
SELECT customer_id, campaign_id, DATE_TRUNC('day', time) AS day, SUM(clicks) AS total_clicks FROM customer_engagement_metrics WHERE time >= '2022-01-01' GROUP BY customer_id, campaign_id, day;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(clicks) AS avg_clicks, AVG(impressions) AS avg_impressions FROM customer_engagement_metrics GROUP BY customer_id HAVING avg_clicks > 50 AND avg_impressions < 200;
SELECT * FROM CustomerEngagementMetrics WHERE customer_id = 123
SELECT customer_id, engagement_type FROM CustomerEngagementMetrics WHERE engagement_type = 'like' ORDER BY engagement_timestamp DESC
SELECT campaign_id, SUM(impressions) AS total_impressions FROM CampaignPerformanceMetrics GROUP BY campaign_id
SELECT engagement_type, COUNT(*) AS total_engagements FROM CustomerEngagementMetrics GROUP BY engagement_type
SELECT * FROM CampaignPerformanceMetrics WHERE conversions > 0 ORDER BY clicks DESC
SELECT customer_id, campaign_id, engagement_type, engagement_timestamp FROM CustomerEngagementMetrics WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT campaign_id, impressions, clicks, conversions FROM CampaignPerformanceMetrics WHERE campaign_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM CustomerEngagementMetrics WHERE engagement_type = 'click' ORDER BY engagement_timestamp DESC;

SELECT customer_id, campaign_id, SUM(clicks) AS total_clicks FROM CustomerEngagementMetrics JOIN CampaignPerformanceMetrics ON CustomerEngagementMetrics.campaign_id = CampaignPerformanceMetrics.campaign_id GROUP BY customer_id, campaign_id;
SELECT campaign_id, SUM(impressions) AS total_impressions, AVG(conversions) AS avg_conversions FROM CampaignPerformanceMetrics GROUP BY campaign_id ORDER BY total_impressions DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, engagement_score, conversion_rate FROM customers JOIN campaign_metrics ON customers.customer_id = campaign_metrics.customer_id;
SELECT campaign_name, click_count FROM campaigns WHERE end_date < '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY email DESC;
SELECT customer_id, phone_number FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT * FROM campaign_metrics WHERE engagement_score > 50 ORDER BY engagement_score DESC, click_count ASC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE end_date > '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM engagement_metrics ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, clicks, impressions, conversion_rate FROM performance_metrics WHERE clicks > 1000;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM customers JOIN engagement_metrics ON customers.customer_id = engagement_metrics.customer_id;

SELECT campaign_name, clicks, ROUND(conversion_rate, 2) AS rounded_conversion_rate FROM campaigns JOIN performance_metrics ON campaigns.campaign_id = performance_metrics.campaign_id WHERE clicks > 100 AND impressions < 5000 ORDER BY rounded_conversion_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 2;
SELECT c.customer_name, i.interaction_type, i.interaction_date FROM customers c JOIN interactions i ON c.customer_id = i.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 3;
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM interactions WHERE customer_id = 4;
SELECT click_id, click_time, device_type FROM clicks WHERE click_id = 5;
